'''Automaton Front''' is the fourth Act of [[Thunder Sojourn]] [[Event]].

==[[File:Icon Peculiar Wonderland.svg|30x30px]] Event Details==
During the event, complete the "[[Facing Distant Echoes]]" quest to unlock Act IV: Automaton Front.
Complete the Domain challenge to obtain [[Thunder Crystal]]s. Thunder Crystals can be used to redeem for rewards in the [[Thunder Sojourn#Thunder Crystal|Event Shop]].

===Tutorial===
{| class="tdt1 tdt2" cellspacing="5"
|[[File:Tutorial Automaton Front 1.png|200px]]
|During the Thunder Sojourn event, Travelers can challenge the "Automaton Front" Domain. Defeat the [[Perpetual Mechanical Array]] to obtain precious [[Thunder Crystal]].
|-
|[[File:Tutorial Automaton Front 2.png|200px]]
|Mechanisms such as Thunder Dwellings and Nimbus Gems will appear within this Domain. Use them wisely to defeat your opponents more easily!
|}

==Rewards==
Completing the challenge rewards {{Item|Thunder Crystal|30|x=300}}.
